tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE OsteoporosisTracking (
    patient_id INT,
    bone_density DECIMAL,
    measurement_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Patient (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  bone_density FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE BoneDensityMeasurement (
  measurement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES Patient(patient_id),
  measurement_date DATE,
  density_value FLOAT,
  measurement_type VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE patient_data (
  patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  bone_density DOUBLE PRECISION
);

CREATE TABLE bone_density_measurements (
  measurement_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  measurement_date DATE,
  bone_density_value DOUBLE PRECISION,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient_data(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE research_studies (
  study_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  study_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  center_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (center_id) REFERENCES research_centers(center_id)
);

CREATE TABLE study_participants (
  participant_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  study_id INT,
  patient_id INT,
  enrollment_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (study_id) REFERENCES research_studies(study_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient_data(patient_id)
);
